import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' import Stack from 'react-bootstrap/Stack' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; const SupplierModal = () => { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return ( <>
Add a new supplier Supplier details Supplier name Product description Contact info First name Last name Product description ) } export default SupplierModal
